title: Searching for Morgana main
body:
Hello,
my name is Kevin (ig: DARKSONIC2112) and I'm a Yi otp since season 3.
I'd like to climb back to Diamond and further in flex Q and I want to do this with a Morgana Top, Mid or Supp to shield me :3.
If you are interested, feel free to add me.
I'm 18 and from germany, so if you either speak english or german and we'll be fine :).
